DATABASE_description: File to store Twitter data (tweets, user info)
CACHE_DURATION_description: How long (in seconds) to cache Twitch data before refreshing
USERNAME_description: Your Twitter username (used for authentication to get tweets.)
PASSWORD_description: Your Twitter password (used for authentication to get tweets)
TWITCH_API_KEY_description: API key for accessing the Twitch API https://rapidapi.com/kingsizeblock/api/gwyo-twitch
